tool_description:
Philippines TIN OCR API allows you to onboard your customers with speed and precision.

Enable them to pre-fill their onboarding forms instantly, by just uploading or scanning their Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) card – IDfy will digitize the document for you!
title: Philippines TIN OCR

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Philippines TIN OCR
api_list.description:
Philippines TIN OCR API allows you to onboard your customers with speed and precision.

Enable them to pre-fill their onboarding forms instantly, by just uploading or scanning their Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) card – IDfy will digitize the document for you!

Use Get call in the bundle to obtain results of the response received.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://philippines-tin-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/extract/phl_tin"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "philippines-tin-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://philippines-tin-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/extract/phl_tin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "philippines-tin-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
